name: Dungeon Champion (Prototype)
description:
Prototype for Dungeon Champion. 

You get to control the brave knight, Percival. You must first guide him through the gauntlet of defeating all of the ogres. By defeating all of the ogres, Percival will then be granted access to enter the Skeletal Monarch's dungeon. Once inside the dungeon, Percival must defeat the Skeletal Monarch to complete his quest.
